text: Frans Derks OON (1 November 1930 â€“ 25 September 2020) was a Dutch football referee and sports executive. He was born in Vaals, Netherlands. He was Chairman of FC Dordrecht. From 1956 to 1978, he was a referee for Eredivisie. Derks died of a short-illness on 25 September 2020 in Breda, Netherlands at the age of 89.Voormalig scheidsrechter Frans Derks (89) overleden - Telegraaf ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Dutch businesspeople Category:Dutch football referees Category:Sportspeople from Limburg (Netherlands)
title: Frans Derks
